quoteText: In the event of material changes to the Terms, we will notify you at least 30 days before these new Terms apply to you, by issuing notice accessible through your use of the Services or by email to your registered email account.
title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance
